vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ποσάκις [ᾰ],
adverb how many times? how often? [Refs 5th c.BC+]; poetry ποσσάκι [Refs 3rd c.BC+]
__II Indef., so many times, οἱ π. ποσοὶ [ἀριθμοί], i.e. square numbers, and οἱ π. π. ποσοί cubes, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
how many times?; how often!
How many times? How often?, Mt. 18:21; 23:37; Lk. 13:34*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: adv. ¿cuán a menudo?, ¿con qué frecuencia?, ¿cuántas veces?
